==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=y|からだ|ちゅう|k2=じゅう|r=y}}

===Etymology 1===
Compound of {{suffix|lang=ja|sort=からだじゅう|体|tr1=karada|t1=body|中|tr2=jū|t2=throughout}}.  {{rendaku2|sort=からだじゅう|chū|jū}}  The {{m|ja|中}} character is often read as ''chū'' in compounds, with a meaning of “middle; inside, within”, but when read as ''jū'' with [[rendaku]], the meaning shifts to “throughout, all over”.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=y|からだじゅう}}

====Alternative forms====
* {{l|ja|身体中}} {{qualifier|less common}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|からだじゅう}}

# [[throughout]] the [[body]], from head to foot, [[all over]]

===Etymology 2===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|たい|ちゅう}}
May be from {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=たいちゅう}} compound {{m|zh|體}}{{m|zh|中|tr=thej<sup>X</sup> trjuwng|lit=body + center; within}}.

Alternatively, may be a {{etyl|ja|-}} coinage using {{etyl|ltc|-}}-derived elements, as a compound of {{m|ja|体|tr=tai||body}} + {{m|ja|中|tr=chū||within, inside}}.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=goon|たいちゅう}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|たいちゅう|kyu=體中}}

# the [[inside]] of the [[body]], somewhere inside the body
